{"id":311947621,"lang":"python","lang_name":"Python","time":"3 years, 5 months","timestamp":1584064332,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"52 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/311947621/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"11.9 MB","code":"# Definition for singly-linked list.\n# class ListNode(object):\n#     def __init__(self, x):\n#         self.val = x\n#         self.next = None\n\nclass Solution(object):\n    def addTwoNumbers(self, l1, l2):\n        \"\"\"\n        :type l1: ListNode\n        :type l2: ListNode\n        :rtype: ListNode\n        \"\"\"\n        sentinel, carry, summ = ListNode(0), 0, 0\n        curr = sentinel\n        while l1 or l2:\n            x = l1.val if l1 else 0\n            y = l2.val if l2 else 0\n            summ = (x + y + carry) % 10\n            carry = (x + y + carry) // 10\n            curr.next = ListNode(summ)\n            l1 = l1.next if l1 else None\n            l2 = l2.next if l2 else None\n            curr = curr.next\n        if carry:\n            curr.next = ListNode(carry)\n        return sentinel.next","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
